AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ten undocumented aliens: undocumented immigrants discovered at the immigration checkpoint stop, hidden in the tractor-trailer's sleeper area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: driver of the tractor-trailer at the immigration checkpoint stop, interacted with Luis Pena and gave consent for search
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant arguing about the lawfulness of the immigration checkpoint stop's duration
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant who transported the aliens and challenges the search of the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: United States Border Patrol Agent who approached the driver-side door and asked Zeba Williams to open it
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: United States Border Patrol Agent who prepared to have his canine, Aroxa, perform a sniff of the tractor-trailer's exterior steps
